artist: Artist: Okada Beisanjin; Artist: Okada Hankō
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Maria and Edward J. Casey
description: text at beginning and end; text with images throughout: man and woman individually working outdoors, man with two deer, male and female musicians, procession with cart drawn by ox and other images
title: A Tale of Mom and Dad in Olden Times
